content.content: 1. A direction to seize an article under subsection 14 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A direction to seize an article under subsection 14 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1.

content.content: 2. An application to the Small Claims Court under section 23 of the Act shall be in Form 2.
content.raw_html: 2. An application to the Small Claims Court under section 23 of the Act shall be in Form 2.

content.section: Application under s. 24 of the Act
content.content: 3. An application under section 24 of the Act shall be in Form 3.
content.raw_html: 3. An application under section 24 of the Act shall be in Form 3.

content.content: 4. An initial certificate under subsection 24 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 4.
content.raw_html: 4. An initial certificate under subsection 24 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 4.

content.content: 5. A notice of objection by a respondent under subsection 24 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 5.
content.raw_html: 5. A notice of objection by a respondent under subsection 24 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 5.

content.content: 6. A final certificate under subsection 24 (7) of the Act shall be in Form 6.
content.raw_html: 6. A final certificate under subsection 24 (7) of the Act shall be in Form 6.

content.content: 7. A writ of seizure under subsection 24 (9) of the Act shall be in Form 7.
content.raw_html: 7. A writ of seizure under subsection 24 (9) of the Act shall be in Form 7.

content.section: Receipt for article that is released
content.content: 8. A receipt under subsection 24 (11) of the Act for an article that a respondent releases to an applicant in compliance with an initial or final certificate shall be in Form 8.
content.raw_html: 8. A receipt under subsection 24 (11) of the Act for an article that a respondent releases to an applicant in compliance with an initial or final certificate shall be in Form 8.

content.section: Receipt for article that is seized
content.content: 9. A receipt under subsection 24 (11) of the Act for an article that is seized by a sheriff or bailiff under a writ of seizure shall be in Form 9.
content.raw_html: 9. A receipt under subsection 24 (11) of the Act for an article that is seized by a sheriff or bailiff under a writ of seizure shall be in Form 9.

content.content: 10. A waiver of further claim under subsection 24 (11) of the Act shall be in Form 10.
content.raw_html: 10. A waiver of further claim under subsection 24 (11) of the Act shall be in Form 10.

content.content: 11. An irrevocable letter of credit is prescribed as a type of security for the purposes of subsections 24 (4) and (7) of the Act and it shall be in Form 11.
content.raw_html: 11. An irrevocable letter of credit is prescribed as a type of security for the purposes of subsections 24 (4) and (7) of the Act and it shall be in Form 11.

content.content: 12. A financial guarantee bond is prescribed as a type of security for the purposes of subsections 24 (4) and (7) of the Act and it shall be in Form 12.
content.raw_html: 12. A financial guarantee bond is prescribed as a type of security for the purposes of subsections 24 (4) and (7) of the Act and it shall be in Form 12.

content.content:
13. In this Regulation, when a form is referred to by number, the reference is to the form with that number that is described in the Table of Forms at the end of this Regulation and is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository. Table of Forms   (See section 13) Form Number   Form Title   Date of Form 

  1   Direction to Seize under Section 14   January 2018 

  2   Application under Section 23 for Small Claims Court   January 2018 

  3   Application for Initial Certificate under Section 24   January 2018 

  4   Initial Certificate under Section 24   January 2018 

  5   Notice of Objection under Section 24   January 2018 

  6   Final Certificate under Section 24   January 2018 

  7   Writ of Seizure under Section 24   January 2018 

  8   Receipt under Section 24 for Article that is Released   January 2018 

  9   Receipt under Section 24 for Article that is Seized   January 2018 

  10   Waiver of Further Claim under Section 24   January 2018 

  11   Irrevocable Letter of Credit   January 2018 

  12   Financial Guarantee Bond under Section 24   January 2018
